name: A day at my friend's house
name_original: A day at my friend's house
description:
This is a short game I created for the #LuigikidCreepypastaChallenge. It was made with the RPG Maker VX Ace Engine.

You play as a nineteen-year-old girl named Lilian who wants to have a sleepover with her best friend Catrin, but something goes terribly wrong...

The game is based on an ALMOST true story. Try to guess which parts of the story aren't real.
